metadata.name: 11.2.c Share of inhabitants connected to water supply system in urban areas
metadata.priority: Supporting cities in dealing with sudden changes, crises, both socio-economic and environmental, and guaranteeing safety and high quality of life for inhabitants
metadata.definition: Share of population living in urban areas connected to water supply system in the total population of urban areas.
metadata.methodology: Information on water supply systems is derived from business entities that are providers of municipal services in this area.  Transmission (main) water supply network  - conduits supplying water from a distant water intake to water supply distribution network.  Water supply system â€“ a set of water network devices serving collection of surface and underground waters, public wells, devices serving storage and treatment of water, water supply networks, water pressure control devices.
